All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppDriver
The driver of the MovieManagementSystem project
DatabaseDriver
The Interface for connecting the database to the program COntains the signatures of the Connect, get(query), update, and disconnect methods
MariaDBDriver
Class description: Driver for connecting to and accessing a MySQL or MariaDB database.
Movie
The Movie class for the table movies in the database
MovieManagementSystem
The Management System for the Movie class
